Macon.WAYS (AM):
WAYS AM 1500, known as 1500 The Fan, is a radio station serving the Macon, Georgia area with a sports radio format. This station is under ownership of Cumulus Media.
Until September 4, 2009, it was an affiliate of ABC Radio's True Oldies Channel when it was Oldies Radio 1500, with the slogan "Macon's True Oldies Channel".
